UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Designed symmetrical β-hairpin peptides for treating multidrug-resistant salmonella typhimurium infections.
Literature.Author: Ma Z, Zhang D, Cheng Z, Niu Y, Kong L, Lu Z, Bie X

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=>128µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi A CICC 21501(MIC=128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi B CICC 21495(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Paratyphi C CICC 21512(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis ATCC 13312(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Choleraesuis CICC 21493 (MIC=128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis CICC 21527(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Wandsworth CICC 21504(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium CICC 21483(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium CICC 21913(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Blockley CICC 21489(MIC=64µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Dublin CICC 21497(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=>128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=128µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 700408(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=16µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(30-40% Cytotoxicity=128µg/ml)
